photoeffects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Custom Color (limited))
weight: Approx. 185 g (including battery/batteries and memory card)
brightness: Adjustable to one of five levels.
batteries: 2x Size-AA Alkaline or Ni-MH Batteries (Alkalines supplied)
computer: Hi-Speed USB (MTP, PTP) dedicated connector (Mini-B compatible)
canonprinters: Canon SELPHY Compact Photo Printers and Canon Inkjet Printers supporting PictBridge (ID Photo Print, Fixed Size Print and Movie Print supported on SELPHY CP & ES printers only)
continuousshooting: Approx. 1.0 shots/sec. (until memory card becomes full)
afsystempoints: AiAF (Face Detection / 9-point), 1-point AF (fixed to centre or Face Select and Track)
flashexposurecompensation: Face Detection FE, Smart Flash Exposure
afmodes: Single, Continuous (Auto mode only), Servo AF/AE, Tracking AF
stillimagetype: JPEG compression, (Exif 2.3 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
closestfocusingdistance: 3 cm (W) from front of lens in macro
modes: Auto*, Easy*, P, Live View Control, SCN (Blur Reduction (2.0MP), Portrait, Landscape, Kids & Pets, Smart Shutter (Smile, Wink Self-Timer, FaceSelf-Timer), Low Light (2.0MP), Beach, Foliage, Snow, Fireworks, Long Shutter), Creative Filters (Fish-eye Effect, Miniature Effect, Toy Camera Effect, Monochrome, Super Vivid, Poster Effect), Discreet, Movie
type: SD, SDHC, SDXC, MMC, MMCplus, HCMMCplus
settings: Auto (including Face Detection WB), Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Custom
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre)
zoom: Optical 4x. Digital Approx. 4x (with Digital Tele-Converter Approx. 1.5x or 2.0x and Safety Zoom). Combined Approx. 16x
movielength: (HD) Up to 4 GB or 10 min. 00 sec.
powersupplybatterychargers: Battery Charger Kit CBK4-300, Ni-MH Batteries NB4-300, AC adapter kit ACK800
menulanguages: English, German, French, Dutch, Danish, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Chinese (traditional), Japanese, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Greek, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Thai, Arabic, Ukrainian, Romanian, Farsi, Hindi
